attributes.action: Allow 16 & 17 year olds to vote if there is another Brexit referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Every young person I have spoken to, are frustrated with not being heard. Not having a voice. It's their future too.
attributes.background: Leaving Europe will be life changing for us all. But will have the biggest impact on our young people's future. They need and deserve to have a say in their future.
